column4: when I enable the the boot to boot from the cd the installation cd doesn't work?

it says: reboot and select proper boot device or insert boot media in selected boot device..

magic ISO
at the first screen you see on your monitor enter tab and then you see a CMOS setup utility.... look for somthing like First Boot Device and check it can be set to CDROM
I have a bios setup utility and 1st booting device is my DVD -rom
it doesn`t matter what OS you are running when you want to boot from cd
sometimes it ca be related to your cdrom
for example my cdrom can run any cd except knoppix OS
